description: "Four sheets of a map of Asia from Car Ritter’s book ‘Erdkunde [Geography]’, including the northwest Birman Empire (Myanmar) and featuring rivers, mountains, administrative districts and settlements. Plus a page of elevations of Asian mountain ranges."
title: "Karte von Hoch-Asien zu C. Ritter's Erdkunde, Buch II, Asien, Th. 1 & 2"
